refnamediv.refpurpose: Copies from one table to another with a gain control.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is is a variant of tablecopy, copying from one table to another, starting at ipos, and with a gain control. The number of points copied is determined by the length of the source. Other points are not changed. This opcode can be used to hit a string in the scanned synthesis code.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: imult -- gain multiplier. A value of 0 will leave values unchanged.
